9 #include <glib-2.0/glib.h>
10 #include <gstreamer-1.0/gst/gst.h>
11 #include <gst/video/video.h>
12 #include <stdio.h>
13 #include <stdlib.h>
14 #include <string.h>
15 #include "../../include/conf/stream-conf.h"
16 #include "../../include/streaming/detect.h"
17 #include "../../include/streaming/filter.h"

21 #define KEY_NO_FILTER_VALUE "no-filter"
22 
23 /*
24  * \brief tells if key "encoding" is set to no-filter
25  * \param ecoding the list of key value from configuration file
26  * \return TRUE if key "encoding" is set to no-filter or FALSE
27  */
28 static gboolean no_filter_encoding(const gchar * const * encoding){
29  return (g_strv_contains(encoding, KEY_NO_FILTER_VALUE ));
30 }
31 
32 /*
33  * \brief tells if key "resolution" is set to no-filter
34  * \param resolution the list of key value from configuration file
35  * \return TRUE if key "encoding" is set to no-filter or FALSE
36  */
37 static gboolean no_filter_resolution(const gchar * const * resolution){
38  return (g_strv_contains(resolution, KEY_NO_FILTER_VALUE ));
39 }
40 
41 /*
42  * return TRUE if all encoding are used
43  */
44 static gboolean all_encodings(const gchar * const * encoding){
45  return (g_strv_contains(encoding, "all") ||
46  ( g_strv_contains(encoding, "RGB") &&
47  g_strv_contains(encoding, "YUV") &&
48  g_strv_contains(encoding, "Monochrome")));
49 }
50 
51 /*
52  * return TRUE if all resolutions are used
53  */
54 static gboolean all_resolutions(const gchar * const * resolution){
55  return (g_strv_contains(resolution, "all") ||
56  ( g_strv_contains(resolution, "576i") &&
57  g_strv_contains(resolution, "720p") &&
58  g_strv_contains(resolution, "1080i") &&
59  g_strv_contains(resolution, "1080p") ));
60 }
61 
62 
63 /*
64  * This function build the default GValue for widths
65  * iparameters taken are the indexes of desired min and max width
66  */
67 /* local define for the array of widths */
68 static GValue build_list(int* int_array, gchar** char_array, int length_array ){
69  GValue resolution = G_VALUE_INIT;
70  g_value_init (&resolution, GST_TYPE_LIST);
71  GValue item = G_VALUE_INIT;
72  if( int_array != NULL){
73  g_value_init (&item, G_TYPE_INT);
74  /* Build list of values */
75  for(int i=0; i < length_array; i++){
76  g_value_set_int (&item, int_array[i]);
77  gst_value_list_append_value (&resolution, &item);
78  }
79  }
80  else if ( char_array != NULL){
81  g_value_init (&item, G_TYPE_STRING);
82  /* Build list of values */
83  for(int i=0; i < length_array; i++){
84  g_value_set_static_string (&item, char_array[i]);
85  gst_value_list_append_value (&resolution, &item);
86  }
87  }
88  else{
89  g_critical("problem while building list");
90  }
91  return resolution;
92 }
93 
94 
95 static void set_filter_field( GstStructure* gst,
96  const gchar* field,
97  int* int_array,
98  gchar** char_array,
99  int length_array
100  ){
101  GValue set = G_VALUE_INIT;
102  /* if Value is NULL, we are initializing a list of values */
103  g_value_init (&set,GST_TYPE_LIST);
104  set = build_list(int_array, char_array,length_array);
105 
106  gst_structure_set_value(gst,
107  field,
108  &set);
109 }
110 
111 /*
112  * Copy the content of array 2 into array 1 from offset "offset"
113  */
114 static void copy(char* array1[], int length1, int offset, char* array2[], int length2){
115  int i = 0;
116  if(array1 != NULL && array2 != NULL){
117  if( length1 >= (length2 + offset)){
118  for(i=0; i<length2; i++)
119  array1[i + offset] = array2[i];
120  }
121  }
122 }
123 
124 /*
125  * Build the RAW filter caps
126  */
127 /* define lenght for the Arrays of encodings */
128 #define length_RGB 4
129 #define length_YUV 5
130 #define length_Mono 3
131 /* define lenght for the Arrays of resolutions */
132 #define length_width_576 4
133 #define length_height_576 2
134 #define length_width 6
135 #define length_height 4
136 /* define number of interlace-mode used */
137 #define num_inter_mode 2
138 
144 static GstStructure* build_RAW_filter(GKeyFile* gkf){
145  const gchar * const * encoding = (const gchar * const *) get_raw_encoding(gkf);
146  const gchar * const * resolution = (const gchar * const *) get_raw_res(gkf);
147  GstStructure* raw_filter = gst_structure_new_from_string ("video/x-raw");
148 
149  /* Define the array used to build the filter */
150  char* RGB[length_RGB] = { "RGB", "RGBA", "BGR", "BGRA" };
151  char* YUV[length_YUV] = { "AYUV", "UYVY", "I420", "Y41B", "UYVP" };
152  char* Monochrome[length_Mono] = { "GRAY8", "GRAY16_BE", "GRAY16_LE" };
153  int length = length_RGB + length_YUV + length_Mono;
154  int offset = 0;
155  char* formats[length];
156 
157  if ( !no_filter_encoding(encoding)){
158 
159  /* Add encoding part */
160  if( all_encodings(encoding) ){
161  /* Build array of full formats */
162  copy(formats, length, 0, RGB, length_RGB);
163  copy(formats, length, length_RGB, YUV, length_YUV );
164  copy(formats, length, length_RGB+length_YUV, Monochrome, length_Mono );
165  set_filter_field(raw_filter, "format", NULL, formats , length);
166  }else{
167  length = 0 ;
168  if( g_strv_contains(encoding, "RGB") ){
169  length += length_RGB;
170  copy(formats, length, offset, RGB, length_RGB);
171  offset += length_RGB;
172  }
173  if( g_strv_contains(encoding, "YUV") ){
174  length += length_YUV;
175  copy(formats, length, offset, YUV, length_YUV );
176  offset += length_YUV;
177  }
178  if( g_strv_contains(encoding, "Monochrome") ){
179  length += length_Mono;
180  copy(formats, length, offset, Monochrome, length_Mono );
181  offset += length_Mono;
182  }
183  set_filter_field(raw_filter, "format",NULL, formats, length);
184  }
185 
186  }
187 
188  int width_small[length_width_576] = {544,576,720,768};
189  int heigth_small[length_height_576] = {576,704};
190  int* width = (int*) malloc(length_width * sizeof(int));
191  int* height = (int*) malloc(length_height * sizeof(int));
192  char* interlace_mode[num_inter_mode];
193  char* interlaced[1] ={"interlaced"};
194  char* progressive[1] ={"progressive"};
195  int offset_width = 0;
196  int offset_height = 0;
197  int offset_im = 0;
198 
199  if ( !no_filter_resolution(resolution)){
200 
201  /* Add resolution part */
202  if( all_resolutions( resolution ) )
203  {
204  /* witdht */
205  memcpy(width, width_small, length_width_576 * sizeof(int));
206  offset_width += length_width_576;
207  *(width + offset_width) = 1280;
208  offset_width ++;
209  *(width + offset_width) = 1920;
210  offset_width ++;
211  set_filter_field(raw_filter, "width", width, NULL, length_width);
212  /* height */
213  memcpy(height, heigth_small, length_height_576 * sizeof(int));
214  offset_height += length_height_576;
215  *(height + offset_height) = 720;
216  offset_height ++;
217  *(height + offset_height) = 1080;
218  offset_height ++;
219  set_filter_field(raw_filter, "height", height, NULL, length_height);
220  /* interlaced-mode */
221  copy(interlace_mode, num_inter_mode, 0, interlaced, 1 );
222  offset_im++;
223  copy(interlace_mode, num_inter_mode, offset_im, progressive, 1 );
224  set_filter_field(raw_filter,"interlace-mode",NULL, interlace_mode, num_inter_mode);
225  }else{
226  if( g_strv_contains(resolution,"576i") ){
227  memcpy(width, width_small, length_width_576 * sizeof(int));
228  offset_width += length_width_576;
229  memcpy(height, heigth_small, length_height_576 * sizeof(int));
230  offset_height += length_height_576;
231  copy(interlace_mode, num_inter_mode,offset_im , interlaced, 1 );
232  offset_im++;
233  }
234  if( g_strv_contains(resolution, "720p") ){
235  *(width + offset_width) = 1280;
236  offset_width ++;
237  *(height + offset_height) = 720;
238  offset_height ++;
239  copy(interlace_mode, num_inter_mode,offset_im , progressive, 1 );
240  offset_im++;
241  }
242  if( g_strv_contains(resolution, "1080p" ) ){
243  *(width + offset_width) = 1920;
244  offset_width ++;
245  *(height + offset_height) = 1080;
246  offset_height ++;
247  copy(interlace_mode, num_inter_mode,offset_im , progressive, 1 );
248  offset_im++;
249  }
250  else if( g_strv_contains(resolution, "1080i") ){
251  if( g_strv_contains(resolution, "1080p" ) ){
252  copy(interlace_mode, num_inter_mode,offset_im , interlaced, 1 );
253  offset_im++;
254  }else{
255  *(width + offset_width) = 1920;
256  offset_width ++;
257  *(height + offset_height) = 1080;
258  offset_height ++;
259  copy(interlace_mode, num_inter_mode,offset_im , interlaced, 1 );
260  offset_im++;
261  }
262  }
263  set_filter_field(raw_filter, "width", width, NULL, offset_width);
264  set_filter_field(raw_filter, "height", height, NULL, offset_height);
265  set_filter_field(raw_filter,"interlace-mode",NULL, interlace_mode, MIN(num_inter_mode,offset_im));
266  }
267  }
268 
269 // set_filter_field(raw_filter, "framerate", GST_VIDEO_FPS_RANGE);
270 // printf("%s", gst_structure_to_string (raw_filter) );
271  free(width);
272  free(height);
273  return raw_filter;
274 }
275 
281 static GstStructure* build_MPEG4_filter(GKeyFile* gkf){
282  const gchar * const * resolution = (const gchar * const *) get_mp4_res(gkf);
283  GstStructure* mpeg_filter = gst_structure_new_from_string ("video/mpeg, mpegversion=(int)4");
284  int width_small[length_width_576] = {544, 576, 720, 768};
285  int heigth_small[length_height_576] = {576, 704};
286  int* width = (int*) malloc(length_width * sizeof(int));
287  int* height = (int*) malloc(length_height * sizeof(int));
288  char* interlace_mode[num_inter_mode];
289  char* interlaced[1] ={"interlaced"};
290  char* progressive[1] ={"progressive"};
291  int offset_width = 0;
292  int offset_height = 0;
293  int offset_im = 0;
294 
295  if ( !no_filter_resolution(resolution)){
296 
297  /* Add resolution part */
298  if( all_resolutions( resolution ) )
299  {
300  /* witdth */
301  memcpy(width, width_small, length_width_576 * sizeof(int));
302  offset_width += length_width_576;
303  *(width + offset_width) = 1280;
304  offset_width ++;
305  *(width + offset_width) = 1920;
306  offset_width ++;
307  set_filter_field(mpeg_filter, "width", width, NULL, length_width);
308  /* height */
309  memcpy(height, heigth_small, length_height_576 * sizeof(int));
310  offset_height += length_height_576;
311  *(height + offset_height) = 720;
312  offset_height ++;
313  *(height + offset_height) = 1080;
314  offset_height ++;
315  set_filter_field(mpeg_filter, "height", height, NULL, length_height);
316  /* interlaced-mode */
317  copy(interlace_mode, num_inter_mode, 0, interlaced, 1 );
318  offset_im++;
319  copy(interlace_mode, num_inter_mode, offset_im, progressive, 1 );
320  set_filter_field(mpeg_filter,"interlace-mode",NULL, interlace_mode, num_inter_mode);
321  }else{
322  if( g_strv_contains(resolution,"576i") ){
323  memcpy(width, width_small, length_width_576 * sizeof(int));
324  offset_width += length_width_576;
325  memcpy(height, heigth_small, length_height_576 * sizeof(int));
326  offset_height += length_height_576;
327  copy(interlace_mode, num_inter_mode,offset_im , interlaced, 1 );
328  offset_im++;
329  }
330  if( g_strv_contains(resolution, "720p") ){
331  *(width + offset_width) = 1280;
332  offset_width ++;
333  *(height + offset_height) = 720;
334  offset_height ++;
335  copy(interlace_mode, num_inter_mode,offset_im , progressive, 1 );
336  offset_im++;
337  }
338  if( g_strv_contains(resolution, "1080p" ) ){
339  *(width + offset_width) = 1920;
340  offset_width ++;
341  *(height + offset_height) = 1080;
342  offset_height ++;
343  copy(interlace_mode, num_inter_mode,offset_im , progressive, 1 );
344  offset_im++;
345  }
346  else if( g_strv_contains(resolution, "1080i") ){
347  if( g_strv_contains(resolution, "1080p" ) ){
348  copy(interlace_mode, num_inter_mode,offset_im , interlaced, 1 );
349  offset_im++;
350  }else{
351  *(width + offset_width) = 1920;
352  offset_width ++;
353  *(height + offset_height) = 1080;
354  offset_height ++;
355  copy(interlace_mode, num_inter_mode,offset_im , interlaced, 1 );
356  offset_im++;
357  }
358  }
359  set_filter_field(mpeg_filter, "width", width, NULL, offset_width);
360  set_filter_field(mpeg_filter, "height", height, NULL, offset_height);
361  set_filter_field(mpeg_filter,"interlace-mode", NULL, interlace_mode, MIN(num_inter_mode,offset_im));
362  }
363  }
364 
365  // set_filter_field(raw_filter, "framerate", GST_VIDEO_FPS_RANGE);
366  // printf("%s", gst_structure_to_string (mpeg_filter) );
367  free(width);
368  free(height);
369  return mpeg_filter;
370 
371 }

378 static GstStructure* build_J2K_filter(GKeyFile* gkf){
379  const gchar * const * resolution = (const gchar * const *) get_j2k_res(gkf);
380  GstStructure* j2k_filter = gst_structure_new_from_string ("image/x-jpc");
381  int width_small[length_width_576] = {544, 576, 720, 768};
382  int heigth_small[length_height_576] = {576, 704};
383  int* width = (int*) malloc(length_width * sizeof(int));
384  int* height = (int*) malloc(length_height * sizeof(int));
385  char* interlace_mode[num_inter_mode];
386  char* interlaced[1] ={"interlaced"};
387  char* progressive[1] ={"progressive"};
388  int offset_width = 0;
389  int offset_height = 0;
390  int offset_im = 0;
391 
392  if ( !no_filter_resolution(resolution)){
393 
394  /* Add resolution part */
395  if( all_resolutions( resolution ) )
396  {
397  /* witdth */
398  memcpy(width, width_small, length_width_576 * sizeof(int));
399  offset_width += length_width_576;
400  *(width + offset_width) = 1280;
401  offset_width ++;
402  *(width + offset_width) = 1920;
403  offset_width ++;
404  set_filter_field(j2k_filter, "width", width, NULL, length_width);
405  /* height */
406  memcpy(height, heigth_small, length_height_576 * sizeof(int));
407  offset_height += length_height_576;
408  *(height + offset_height) = 720;
409  offset_height ++;
410  *(height + offset_height) = 1080;
411  offset_height ++;
412  set_filter_field(j2k_filter, "height", height, NULL, length_height);
413  /* interlaced-mode */
414  copy(interlace_mode, num_inter_mode, 0, interlaced, 1 );
415  offset_im++;
416  copy(interlace_mode, num_inter_mode, offset_im, progressive, 1 );
417  set_filter_field(j2k_filter,"interlace-mode",NULL, interlace_mode, num_inter_mode);
418  }else{
419  if( g_strv_contains(resolution,"576i") ){
420  memcpy(width, width_small, length_width_576 * sizeof(int));
421  offset_width += length_width_576;
422  memcpy(height, heigth_small, length_height_576 * sizeof(int));
423  offset_height += length_height_576;
424  copy(interlace_mode, num_inter_mode,offset_im , interlaced, 1 );
425  offset_im++;
426  }
427  if( g_strv_contains(resolution, "720p") ){
428  *(width + offset_width) = 1280;
429  offset_width ++;
430  *(height + offset_height) = 720;
431  offset_height ++;
432  copy(interlace_mode, num_inter_mode,offset_im , progressive, 1 );
433  offset_im++;
434  }
435  if( g_strv_contains(resolution, "1080p" ) ){
436  *(width + offset_width) = 1920;
437  offset_width ++;
438  *(height + offset_height) = 1080;
439  offset_height ++;
440  copy(interlace_mode, num_inter_mode,offset_im , progressive, 1 );
441  offset_im++;
442  }
443  else if( g_strv_contains(resolution, "1080i") ){
444  if( g_strv_contains(resolution, "1080p" ) ){
445  copy(interlace_mode, num_inter_mode,offset_im , interlaced, 1 );
446  offset_im++;
447  }else{
448  *(width + offset_width) = 1920;
449  offset_width ++;
450  *(height + offset_height) = 1080;
451  offset_height ++;
452  copy(interlace_mode, num_inter_mode,offset_im , interlaced, 1 );
453  offset_im++;
454  }
455  }
456  set_filter_field(j2k_filter, "width", width, NULL, offset_width);
457  set_filter_field(j2k_filter, "height", height, NULL, offset_height);
458  set_filter_field(j2k_filter,"interlace-mode", NULL, interlace_mode, MIN(num_inter_mode,offset_im));
459  }
460  }
461 
462  // set_filter_field(raw_filter, "framerate", GST_VIDEO_FPS_RANGE);
463 // printf("%s", gst_structure_to_string (j2k_filter) );
464  free(width);
465  free(height);
466  return j2k_filter;
467 }
468 
476 gboolean filter_VIVOE(GstStructure* input_caps_str, GstElement* input, GstElement* output){
477  GstStructure *raw_filter = NULL;
478  GstStructure *mpeg_filter = NULL;
479  GstStructure *j2k_filter = NULL;
480  GstCaps *vivoe_filter = NULL; /* the final filter to use to filters out non stream video */
481 
482  /* this function does the following:
483  * _ open configuration file
484  * _ read and build filters (RAW, MPEG, J2k) from configuration file
485  * _close configuration file
486  * _ create full caps from the three caps return
487  * _ link filtered input --> output
488  */
489 
490  /* open configuration file */
491  GKeyFile* gkf = open_configuration_file();
492  if(gkf == NULL)
493  return FALSE; /* if not configuration file was found, return NULL, meaning that we will be using the defaults filter for VIVOE formats*/
494  /* Check if RAW fortmat is used bu the user */
495  if( vivoe_use_format(gkf, RAW_GROUP_NAME ))
496  raw_filter = build_RAW_filter(gkf);
497  if( vivoe_use_format(gkf, MPEG4_GROUP_NAME) )
498  mpeg_filter = build_MPEG4_filter(gkf);
499  if( vivoe_use_format(gkf, J2K_GROUP_NAME ))
500  j2k_filter = build_J2K_filter(gkf);
501 
502  /* close configuration file */
503  close_configuration_file(gkf);
504  vivoe_filter = gst_caps_new_full ( raw_filter,
505  mpeg_filter,
506  j2k_filter,
507  NULL);
508  /* When building a new caps from a Structure, the structure is not copied, instead the caps own the structure
509  * it is not wan we want there, so we built a copy the structure before building the input_caps */
510  GstCaps *input_caps = gst_caps_new_full(gst_structure_copy(input_caps_str), NULL);
511 
512  if( gst_caps_can_intersect(input_caps, vivoe_filter)){
513  if ( !gst_element_link_log (input, output ))
514  return FALSE;
515  return TRUE;
516  }else{
517  g_print ("WARNING: Video source input has been filtered out: not a VIVOE format!");
518  return FALSE;
519  }
520 }
